feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.3
entry.content:
Resolve Issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/508 (Dropdown lists in "Apps" page are unreadable when selected)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.2...7.3.3

User report this below and should be resolved (very rare issue)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.4
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.3...7.3.4

To resolve issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/510 (When putting the cursor over the Live Hunts Executed, the text goes blurry.)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.5
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.4...7.3.5

Resolve issues for non-docker users for the timers - as shown here - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/512

The error the user reported; the code was docker specific and not for other OS'es - added to fix.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.7
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.6...7.3.7

Fixed more hard-coded paths to help non-docker users
